answers.text: The first line of the text block
The whole text block except the first line

quizzes.question: The position of which block is specified by the text-indent property?
quizzes.textContent:
[h1]The text-indent Property [/h1] The text-indent property specifies how much horizontal space should be left before the beginning of the first line of the text. Property values are [b]length[/b] (px, pt, cm, em, etc.), [b]%[/b], and [b]inherit[/b]. [b]The HTML:[/b] [code format="html" ]

This is an example of text-indent property. First line of our text is indented to the right in 60px. Besides pixels you can also use other measurement units, like pt, cm, em, etc.

[/code] [b]The CSS:[/b] [code format="css" codeId="526"]p { [b]text-indent[/b]: 60px; }[/code] [b]Result:[/b] [img id="2602" width="100%"] [note]Negative values are allowed. The first line will be indented to the left if the value is negative.[/note]
